sentence: in recent decades, it has been increasingly acknowledged that monetary policy implementation relies importantly on the management of market expectations.2 in theory, clarity about the central bank's reaction function--that is, how the central bank adjusts the stance of monetary policy in response to changing economic conditions--allows the market to alter financial conditions smoothly.

sentence: this survey, conducted about one week prior to each fomc meeting, gauges primary dealers' expectations about the economy, monetary policy, and financial market developments.7 in the june 2013 primary dealer survey, the median expectation was for tapering to start in december 2013, with purchases ending in june 2014, a path not significantly different from that laid out by chairman bernanke in his postmeeting press conference.
